thread.title: MCA Certified Tax Preparers LLC (MCA) launches Next Step Business Advisors (a North Jersey Business Brokerage Firm)
thread.title_full: MCA Certified Tax Preparers LLC (MCA) launches Next Step Business Advisors (a North Jersey Business Brokerage Firm)

author: Marc Adams
title: MCA Certified Tax Preparers LLC (MCA) launches Next Step Business Advisors (a North Jersey Business Brokerage Firm)
text:
MCA Certified Tax Preparers LLC (MCA) launches Next Step Business Advisors to formalize helping business with their "exit strategy." MCA Certified Tax Preparers LLC has been working with businesses since 2002 in all areas of business development. With the change in the economy there has been a shift in business ownership. To help business owners who are transitioning to new endeavors MCA has launched a new business entity - Next Step Business Advisors ( http://www.nextstepnj.com ).
Next Step Business Advisors was formalized to help business owners who are interested in selling their business. In association with The North American Alliance of Business Brokers (NAABB), Next Step Business Advisors (NSBA) has implemented ten different strategies for assisting business owners who want to take the next step in their careers.
"Not every business is salable in the same way, but every business can be transitioned. Next Step Business Advisors has implement the NAABB business strategies for helping every type of business," says Marc Adams (NSBA) founder.
Next Step Business Advisors is built on the NAABB code of ethics and integrity. They are a proud member of the BBB.
